272: S&P Global Corporate The Role: International Tax Compliance Manager The Grade/Level: (relevant for internal applicants only) 12 The Location: Englewood, Colorado The Impact: S&P Global is seeking a high performing and efficient international tax manager to support the tax department function with duties related to income tax compliance and financial reporting.
